page.description: The .FIELD_GET() method returns a pointer to the table field that is bound to the control. Limitations, Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim frm as P dim fld as P dim tblfld as P frm = form.load("Customer Information") fld = frm.child("Lastname") tblfld = fld.Field_Get() ? tblfld.fullname_get() -> "CUSTOMER->LASTNAME"
